name: Rapid Repair
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game: Ultimate Magic. © 2011, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: The targeted construct gains fast healing 5. This does not stack with any fast healing the construct already has. Fast healing has no effect on a construct that has been brought to 0 hit points or destroyed.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 法器
savingThrow_zh: 强韧, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh:
法术抗力 可 (无害)

目标构装生物获得5点快速愈合。这个效果不会与任何已有的快速愈合效果叠加。快速愈合对一个生命值已经为0或已被摧毁的构装生物无效。
